description: These data provide land cover classifications derived from the Boston University MOD12Q1 V004 MODIS/Terra 1 km Land Cover Product (Friedl et al. 2002). The data are available in various EASE-Grid azimuthal and global projections, in 12.5 km and 25 km spatial resolutions. The data are in flat binary, 1 byte files that are stored by row and are available via FTP.
name: EASE-Grid Land Cover Classifications Derived from Boston University MODIS/Terra Land Cover Data
